hero.description: Complete ERP for wineries with native multilingual support. Manage every stage of wine, sparkling wine, and juice production with Bacco ERP. Available in Portuguese, English, Spanish, and Italian - professional translations, not just superficial. Complete traceability, real-time monitoring, integrated artificial intelligence, and unified management. Includes Bacco-Campo for vineyard management and Bacco-Comanda for POS and wine tourism.

history.title: A Bit of History
history.subtitle: A journey that unites technology and passion for wine

text.p1: My journey in technology began long before cloud, containers, and DevOps. In the 90s, I was already exploring the world of code with Clipper and DBASE, when programming was an almost manual art ‚Äî done line by line, with patience and curiosity.
text.p2: Over time, I evolved along with languages and tools: I went through Visual Basic, where I learned to bring graphical interfaces to life, and later dove headfirst into the world of Python and Node.js with TypeScript, building APIs, SaaS systems, and scalable solutions.
text.p3: Starting in 2015, I took on a new passion within technology: DevOps. That's when I began integrating development with infrastructure, automating pipelines, orchestrating containers, and making the deployment cycle something continuous, secure, and predictable. This transition taught me something I carry to this day: a system is alive, and like every organism, it needs balance, care, and constant evolution.
text.p4: But, outside of code, there's another part of me that also seeks this balance: wine. Over 20 years ago, it entered my life ‚Äî first as curiosity, then as passion. In 2023, I completed the sommelier course and, inspired by friend Elisson Manfroi, started the hobby of "winemaker", producing my own wines in an artisanal way.
text.p5: This year, I decided to go further and started enology college, uniting science and sensitivity to understand every detail of the winemaking process.
text.quote: "Today, these two passions ‚Äî technology and wine ‚Äî walk together. Between pipelines and barrels, I found my space: transforming knowledge into tools that empower those who live from grapes and wine."

origin.title: The Origin of Bacco
origin.subtitle: How the idea of creating an exclusive ERP for wineries was born

text.p1: The idea of Bacco was born from a real need: while I was producing my own wines in an artisanal way, I realized that there was no management system in the Brazilian market that really understood the particularities of wine production in Brazil.
text.p2: The available systems were, for the most part, adaptations of generic ERPs or superficial translations of foreign software that did not contemplate Brazilian grape varieties, local practices, MAPA regulations, or the specific needs of small and medium wineries.
text.p3: That's when I decided to unite my two passions ‚Äî technology and wine ‚Äî to create something unique: an ERP developed from scratch, designed exclusively for Brazilian wineries, but with international standards of quality and traceability.
text.p4: Bacco is not just software. It is the result of years of experience in system development, technical knowledge in enology, and a deep understanding of the real needs of those who produce wine in Brazil.
text.extra1: More than software, Bacco represents a vision for the future of Brazilian wine ‚Äî modern, authentic, and made with soul. A system that understands that each lot has a story, each fermentation a rhythm, and each wine an identity.
text.extra2: Bacco is not just an ERP. It is the result of decades of experience in technology meeting a passion for wine. It is the tool I wish existed when I started studying enology.

whyBacco.title: Why Bacco?
whyBacco.description: Bacco is a tribute to Bacchus, the Roman god of wine, harvest, and fertility. We chose this reference not only for the connection with wine, but also for the symbolism: Bacchus represents transformation, celebration, and the union between nature and culture ‚Äî values that perfectly reflect the essence of our system.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Empower Brazilian wineries with top-tier technology, providing a complete and intelligent system that follows every stage of vitiviniculture ‚Äî from vineyard to bottle ‚Äî with full traceability, accurate analyses, and integrated management, allowing producers of all sizes to make data-driven decisions and raise the quality of their wines to international standards.
mission.visionText: To be recognized as the reference ERP for the Brazilian and Latin American wine sector, transforming how wineries manage production by uniting tradition and innovation, contributing to the growth and professionalization of the national wine industry and positioning Brazil as a leader in enology technology.
mission.valuesSubtitle: Principles that guide every line of code and every decision we make

service.text: Bacco ERP is a winery management system offering end-to-end control from vineyard to bottle, including:
items: Vineyard and plot management
Management task control
Intake of own and third-party grapes
Winemaking lots and full process flow

account.title: User Account
account.text: To use Bacco ERP, you must:
items: Provide true, accurate, and complete information during registration
Keep your credentials confidential
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Be responsible for all activities under your account

lgpd.title: Data Protection (LGPD)
lgpd.text: In accordance with the Brazilian LGPD, Bacco ERP commits to:
items: Collect only data necessary to deliver the service
Use data exclusively for the informed purposes
Implement technical and administrative security measures
Not share personal data with third parties without consent
Respect all data subject rights

rights.title: Data Subject Rights
rights.text: Under LGPD, you are entitled to:
items: Confirm processing of your data
Access your personal data
Correct incomplete, inaccurate, or outdated data
Request anonymization, blocking, or deletion
Request data portability
Withdraw consent at any time
Obtain information about data sharing
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact: lussandro@gmail.com

acceptable.title: Acceptable Use
items: Use the system for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Attempt to access restricted areas
Interfere with or disrupt system operation
Copy, modify, or distribute the software without authorization
Reverse engineer the system
Use the system to harm third parties

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content, design, source code, logos, and materials of Bacco ERP are protected. You receive only a limited use license; no ownership rights are transferred.

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.text: We strive for 24/7 availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service. We may perform scheduled maintenance with prior notice when possible.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Bacco ERP is not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from use or inability to use the system. We recommend maintaining regular backups of your data.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may modify these Terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated by email or in-app notice. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We may suspend or terminate access immediately, without prior notice, in case of breach of these Terms. You may close your account at any time via settings or by contacting us.

law.title: Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Brazil. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts of Florian√≥polis, Santa Catarina.

contact.title: Contact

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
paragraphs: This Privacy Policy explains how Bacco ERP collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal data.
By using the system, you agree to this policy. If you do not agree, do not use the service.

sections.heading: 2. Data Collected
paragraphs: We may collect the following information:
list: Data needed for management, compliance, and traceability features

sections.heading: 3. Purpose of Processing
paragraphs: Data is used to deliver and improve the service, meet legal obligations (including SIVIBE/ENVIN), and ensure security and traceability.

sections.heading: 4. Data Sharing
paragraphs: We may share data with essential service providers (infrastructure, email, billing) under confidentiality and only for the contracted purpose.
We do not share data with third parties for marketing.

sections.heading: 5. Security
paragraphs: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including access control, in-transit encryption, and monitoring.
No system is 100% secure; use strong passwords and 2FA where applicable.

sections.heading: 6. Retention
paragraphs: We keep data only as long as necessary to fulfill this policy and legal obligations.
After that period, data is anonymized or securely deleted.

sections.heading: 7. Data Subject Rights
paragraphs: You may exercise your rights under LGPD, including access, correction, deletion, and portability.

sections.heading: 8. Cookies
paragraphs: We use cookies for authentication, security, and experience improvement. You can adjust preferences in your browser.

sections.heading: 9. Contact
paragraphs: For privacy questions or requests, contact:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers about Bacco ERP and discover how it can transform your winery management.

whatIsBacco.question: What is Bacco ERP?
whatIsBacco.answer: Bacco is a complete ERP system developed exclusively for wineries. It manages the entire production process, from vineyard to bottle, including vineyard management, winemaking, quality control, inventory, sales, finance, and wine tourism. It is the only Brazilian ERP 100% specialized in wineries.

countries.question: In which countries is Bacco available?
countries.answer: Bacco is available globally. Developed in Brazil, the system was designed to serve wineries anywhere in the world, with support for local practices, specific regulations, and professional translations in 4 languages.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Bacco is available in 4 languages: Portuguese (Brazil), English, Spanish, and Italian. All translations were professionally made, preserving the enological technical terminology and the specialized context of the wine sector.

installation.question: Does it require installation? How does it work?
installation.answer: No! Bacco is a 100% cloud-based system (SaaS). You access it through a browser from any device, with no need to install anything. Your data is secure on servers with automatic backup and high availability.

support.question: How does technical support work?
support.answer: We offer dedicated support with deep knowledge of the wine market. Our team understands both technology and enology, ensuring specialized assistance for your needs.

aiDifferential.question: What is the AI differential?
aiDifferential.answer: Bacco is a pioneer in AI for wineries in Brazil. Artificial intelligence operates across multiple modules: it suggests corrections in winemaking based on analyses, recommends management practices based on climate and vineyard region, and continuously optimizes processes. It's an AI that truly understands wine.

offline.question: Does the system work offline?
offline.answer: The web system requires an internet connection. However, the Bacco-Campo Android app works 100% offline in the vineyard, automatically syncing when a connection is available. Ideal for fieldwork where internet is unstable.

howToStart.question: How do I start using Bacco?
howToStart.answer: It's simple! Request a free demo through our website or WhatsApp. Our team will present the system, understand your needs, and configure everything so you can start using it quickly. Onboarding includes training and data migration support.

pricing.question: How much does Bacco ERP cost?
pricing.answer: Bacco offers affordable plans for wineries of all sizes, from small artisanal productions to large wineries. Contact us to receive a customized proposal according to your needs.

dataImport.question: Can I import data from other systems?
dataImport.answer: Yes! Our team assists with data migration from spreadsheets or other systems. The process is supervised to ensure that your winery's entire history is preserved and organized in Bacco.

hero.title: The Only Brazilian ERP Developed Exclusively for Wineries
hero.subtitle: Full compliance with SIVIBE, ENVIN, MAPA and NF-e. Developed by those who understand wine for those who live from wine.

compliance.title: Full Compliance with Brazilian Regulations
compliance.subtitle: Bacco ERP was developed to meet 100% of Brazilian legal requirements for the production and commercialization of wines, sparkling wines, and juices.

sivibe.title: SIVIBE
sivibe.description: Wine and Beverage Information System. Generate mandatory declarations under Law 7.678/1988 with automatic deadline alerts and complete compliance control.

envin.title: ENVIN
envin.description: Complete module for ENVIN declarations with export in government-required formats, ensuring full regulatory compliance.

mapa.title: MAPA
mapa.description: Integration with Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Food Supply records. Control of establishments, products, and labeling.

nfe.title: NF-e / NFC-e
nfe.description: Integrated electronic invoice issuance via Webmania. Complete fiscal control with NCM, CFOP, and wine-specific taxation.

highlight.title: Automated Compliance
highlight.description: Never miss deadlines! Bacco automatically monitors all regulatory obligations and sends alerts before due dates. Generate declarations with one click.

campanhGaucha.description: Terroir of stony soils and continental climate.

serraDoSudeste.name: Serra do Sudeste
serraDoSudeste.description: Emerging region with vineyards on granite slopes.

camposDeCima.name: Campos de Cima da Serra
